item.title: How legendary venture firm Insight Partners hires—and trains—its next generation of investors to expand its $90 billion warchest
item.description: Landing a spot in Insight’s coveted summer analyst class is more competitive than Harvard.

item.title: Global stocks shake off reports of collapse in U.S. import trade
item.description: Apollo published a slide deck arguing that the reduction in imports would be enough to trigger a recession in the U.S. starting in the summer.

item.title: Police arrest suspect in theft of Homeland Security Secretary Kristi Noem’s purse
item.description: Noem's purse was nabbed on Easter Sunday and reportedly contained about $3,000 in cash, her keys, driver’s license, passport and Homeland Security bad...

item.title: The Trump era has been a bust for private equity—that’s one reason PE is turning to retail
item.description: With private market products, retail may finally get to invest in unicorns.

item.title: Hybrid COOs are quietly taking over the C-suite
item.description: The hybrid COO is emerging as the glue connecting strategy to execution.
